revised_title: Tone Perception in Gammarus pulex: Investigating the Tonal Sense in Crustaceans
tldr: This study investigates the tonal sense in the crustacean Gammarus pulex, discovering that it responds to specific tones, particularly the bass note of the B flat. The response is observed through the flexing of the first antennae, suggesting that the auditory function is located in these appendages.
